subject: Camps and Camping
Mountain Climbing
lead_paragraph: Eric Larsen believes he has a chance to become the first person to trek to the North and South Poles and scale the summit of Mount Everest in a span of 365 days.
snippet: Eric Larsen believes he has a chance to become the first person to trek to the North and South Poles and scale the summit of Mount Everest in a span of 365 days.
